snippet.title: Milcham:  From The Ashes Of Hearts, opening video
snippet.description:
This is an otome game I have been making with a group of friends. At the moment it is still at the stage of 1/2 done. Preparing for the release of the first episode out of 3 episodes. The plan is to release the last 2 episodes in one go. Hopefully, I can finish writing the whole story by the end of this year.

https://yui-enajori.itch.io/milcham-from-the-ashes-of-hearts

#games #openingvideo #visualnovel #otome #otomegame #gaming #indiegame
